  • 27 Sep 2013
    Clean up old remote branches in GIT

    List what would be deleted: git remote prune origin --dry-run Do the clean up: git remote prune origin Read more!

  • 22 Aug 2013
    Git: pushing to multiple remotes

    Get the actual push remote with: git remote -v Add the new remote with: git remote set-url --add --push origin git://another/repo.git Because of a bug in git (1.8.x) you have to add the original remote again: git remote set-url --add --push origin git://original/repo.git Read more!

  • 11 Jun 2012
    Compile shared libraries with gcc

    Compiling libstest.so: gcc -Wall -fPIC -c *.c gcc -shared -Wl,-soname,libctest.so.1 -o libctest.so.1.0 *.o ln -sf /opt/lib/libctest.so.1.0 /opt/lib/libctest.so ln -sf /opt/lib/libctest.so.1.0 /opt/lib/libctest.so.1 Using libctest: gcc -Wall -L/path/to/lib prog.c -lctest -o prog Running prog: export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH ./prog Read more!

  • 29 May 2012
    CSV export in PostgreSQL

    Execute the following command to dump the query result into a CSV file: echo “COPY (SELECT * from foo) TO STDOUT with CSV HEADER” | psql -o ‘/tmp/test.csv’ database_name Source: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1517635/save-postgre-sql-output-to-csv-file Read more!

  • 02 Mar 2012
    AbstractTextEditor and Cut/Copy/Paste + first keystroke problem

    If the cut,copy/paste commands don’t work in the editor and it doesn’t recognize the first keystroke then you should override the AbstractDocumentProvider’s isReadOnly() method in your document provider. The default implementation always returns true. Change it to false and everything works as expected. Source: http://www.eclipse.org/forums/index.php/t/144925/ Read more!

  • 28 Feb 2012
    Replace symbolic links with tar

    This is a really slow solution, but works: tar -hcf - sourcedir | tar -xf - -C parent_of_newdir Source: http://superuser.com/questions/303559/replace-symbolic-links-with-files Read more!

  • 23 Feb 2012
    Create new Git repository using gitosis in 5 steps

    Add the repo name to gitosis.conf git init project git remote add origin git@SERVER:project.git Add files, etc, do commit. git push origin master More info: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Gitosis Read more!

  • 17 Feb 2012
    Git on Dropbox in 5 commands

    Create git repository: cd ~/Dropbox mkdir -p git/repo.git cd git/repo.git git --bare init Clone: git clone file:///home/user/Dropbox/git/repo.git Source: http://tumblr.intranation.com/post/766290743/using-dropbox-git-repository Read more!

  • 08 Feb 2012
    Recursively remove .svn directories

    Recursively remove .svn directories: rm -rf `find . -type d -name .svn` More info: http://www.ossramblings.com/remove_svn_recursively Read more!

  • 06 Feb 2012
    Simple find and replace text with sed

    Simple find and replace text with sed: sed -i 's/search/replacement/g' text.txt More details: http://www.brunolinux.com/02-The_Terminal/Find_and%20Replace_with_Sed.html Read more!
